title: Womens Dress Bodycon
title_original: Glitter Mesh Bodycon Dress for Women 2025 Birthday,Bachelorette Party

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Formal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars beautiful dress
items.body: beautiful dress, with the right amount bling. i purchased medium could have got a small. Read more
items.author: samantha Bioseh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks EXPENSIVE and gorgeous IRL
items.body: I did not expect to get such a quality dress off of Amazon. The pictures do not give it justice. The glittery part is like chainmail and looks EXPENSIVE. I had to double check how much I paid for it after receiving it. I would size down based on my experience, but even too big, I got endless compliments. I wore it for the dress up night on a cruise. Can't wait to wear again. Read more
items.author: RS

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but way too sheer
items.body: Really wanted to love this dress but it’s way too sheer and sizing is off. This dress runs big. I’m 150lbs and 5’6 and it was too big. I got the” silver “ dress but it looks more white than silver. It’s a pretty dress but you will have to figure out how to not show your X’s and O’s :S might be a good swimsuit cover idk Read more
items.author: Your Amazon Shopper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: Beautiful and shiny. Material is sturdy! Fits perfectly! Read more
items.author: Kia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wanna look like a movie star?
items.body: I do not write reviews but had to for this dress. I'm 5'3" 130 lbs. I bought a medium - could have gone with a small but the medium skims me perfectly. This dress is hot, like movie star glamorous! Beyond sexy! Cannot wait to surprise my husband on our cruise with this number! Read more
items.author: Terry R

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Heavyweight dress, somewhat see-through
items.body: I'd say order this dress in your usual size. I opted to go up a size, from medium to large, and it was too large on me. The dress does have a zipper on one side, and you probably want the dress to be fitted enough to have to use that zipper. For me, I was just able to step into the dress. The dress does have a beige colored slip built-in, but it does show through. You can see in the photos, my black undergarments and even my tattoo. If you had nips that are high contrast, you'd be able to see them underneath as well, so beware (as you cannot wear a bra with this backless dress). The chainlink exterior is pretty weighty (in a good way) and very sparkly, especially in the sunlight. It does stop as it nears the seams on the side of the dress. Length on me would be great with some heels. I'm 5'5", 135lb, 32G for reference. 4/5 stars Read more
items.author: StanfordBear

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress
items.body: I really like this dress, the length is nice and long so its good to keep that in mind. It has a lining and the top fabric is like a netting made with rhinestones that shine very powerfully and bright, making this dress super shiny and elegant for any type of event. The fabric material is nice and strong and feels very durable. Read more
items.author: Nate&Betty

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress but thin inside lining
items.body: I love the way this dress looks on me. The design is beautiful. This dress really pops and it hugs your body in all the right spots. While it is lined on the inside, the lining is very thin and can see through the dress. Read more
items.author: MB

short_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gold-9918, Wine Red-9918, Silver-9918, Pink-9918, Black-23007, Rose Gold-9918. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
